q: talk show host plans to hang up his hat.( Or should we say pants?) "He says this periodically,[ but] I don't want to rule it out," says Burnett. I have no particular insight into when David Letterman is going to want to stop doing the show. I'm not being coy. I honestly don't know. I don't know that he knows. Maybe he does, but there's[ been] no discussion about his leaving. Mrs Twine said: We were all set to do the show, but the heavy snow put a stop to it. "Even if we could have opened the school we wouldn't have had an audience. Meanwhile, back on the official blog Eric Schmidt was more gracious: "But as Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated.

management shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Mr Eric Schmidt said. "By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited

most of its current workers are located. In a speech Tuesday, Eric Schmidt said Google Inc. will hire more than 1,000 workers in Europe this year. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice president of engineering and research. his encounter and explained that he met Mrs. Michelle Obama on the set of LIVE With Regis Philbin and Kelly Ripa , on which they both appeared yesterday. Here's how David Letterman recounted his very first meeting with Michelle Obama . She was on the show, but I didn't think I would see her because the Secret Service doesn't want my kind messing around with her kind, David Letterman joked. However, the officials told David Letterman to wait for the first lady off stage and that she would speak to him after her interview with Regis Philbin and Kelly Ripa . It is a set of working documents that I've never edited. In fact, most I've never reread.
